data.title: C Site Execute Trailblazer Variations
data.description: Use these Trailblazer Variations when pushing into C Site with your team. Just be careful of the flank, and enemy players opening C Door behind you.

data.title: Early Round B Main Guiding Light + Execute Trailblazer
data.description: Use this Guiding Light to push back enemy players inside of or holding an angle into B Main, and then if your team pushes up B Main and is getting ready to push into B Site, use your Trailblazer to lead the Site execute.

data.title: Aggressive Early Round C Main Info Flash
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective aggressive info flash for C Main.

data.title: Aggressive Early Round A Main Info Flash
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective info flash for A Main.
